headings.usage: Main page titles, server names, modal headers. Use tracking-tight.

body.usage: General UI text, descriptions, form labels.

mono.usage: Server console logs, IP addresses, file paths, JSON editors.

textures.noise: Add a subtle noise texture overlay to the main background to prevent banding and add 'grit'.
textures.scanlines: Optional low-opacity scanline overlay on the Console component.

dashboard.description: Asymmetric grid. Server cards take 1 unit. Status summary takes 2 units (horizontal).

mod_browser.description: Dense grid for mod cards. Images on top, compact text below.

server_card.style: Cardless look or deep slate card. Top half is a cover image (use abstract block 3D). Bottom half is details. Status indicator is a glowing dot.
server_card.interaction: Hover: Scale up 1.02, border glows primary color.

console_widget.style: Terminal aesthetic. Black background, JetBrains Mono font. Scrollbar hidden but functional. 'Pause' on hover.
console_widget.features: Auto-scroll to bottom, color-coded log levels (INFO=blue, WARN=yellow, ERROR=red).

wizard_step.style: Left panel: Context/Help. Right panel: Form inputs. Smooth transition between steps.

hero_abstract.description: Blue 3D cubes. Use for 'Vanilla' or default server cover.

modded_abstract.description: Red/Black 3D structure. Use for 'Forge/Fabric' server covers.

landscape_bg.description: Dark city/tech aerial. Use as subtle background for the 'Create Server' wizard.

instructions_to_main_agent: 1. INSTALL FONTS: Add '@fontsource/chivo', '@fontsource/manrope', and '@fontsource/jetbrains-mono' to package.json immediately.
2. TAILWIND CONFIG: Update tailwind.config.js to use the 'Obsidian' color palette defined above. Extend the font family theme.
3. SHADCN OVERRIDE: When using Shadcn components (Button, Card, Dialog), override the default 'radius' and 'border' to match the 'visual_enhancers' section. Make borders darker and subtler.

4. CONSOLE LOGIC: The console component must use 'react-virtuoso' or similar if logs get huge, but for local MVP, a simple mapped div with 'ref' for auto-scroll is fine. Style it like a hacker terminal.
5. NO WHITE BACKGROUNDS: Never use pure white (#ffffff) for backgrounds. Use #fafafa for text only. Backgrounds must be dark.
6. DATA-TESTID: Every interactive element (buttons, inputs, server cards) MUST have a data-testid attribute (e.g., 'server-card-survival', 'btn-start-server').
7. ICONS: Use 'lucide-react' for UI icons (Settings, Play, Stop, Terminal).
8. ANIMATION: Use 'framer-motion' for page transitions and modal appearances. Simple fades and slides.
UNIVERSAL_GUIDELINES_FOR_MAIN_AGENT: Avoid generic 'AI slop' designs. No centered text on dashboards.
Use 2-3x more padding than you think is necessary.
Dark mode is the default. Light mode is secondary.
Micro-interactions are mandatory (hover states, focus rings).
Do not use emoji as icons. Use Lucide React.
